About the Company: JK Paper Limited, a pulp and paper company, engages in the manufacture and sale of branded papers, fine papers, and packaging boards in India and internationally. The company provides various office documentation papers, including photocopy and multi purpose papers for use in fax machines, photocopiers, and multi-functional devices, as well as desktop, inkjet, and laser printers; and premium watermarked and laid marked business stationery papers for corporate and individual customers.
